summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 FORD MUSTANG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) AND HAD TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO MARIN COUNTY FORD DEALER, LOCATED ON 6995 REDWOOD BLVD, NOVATO, CA 94945, WHERE THE VEHICLE FRONT DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG WAS REPLACED BUT THE FRONT PASSENGER AIR BAG WAS REJECTED TO BE SERVICED DUE TO THE REMEDY PART NEEDED FOR THE REPAIR WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THEY WERE WORKING ON THE REMEDY PART FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOLS CONFIRMS PART NOT AVAILABLE.  ..UPDATED 10/25/17 *BF  UPDATED 11/19/2017*JS
